properties.address: The Salvation Army, Bourne, Lincolnshire PE10 9ET
properties.description: Open to all regardless of circumstances
properties.title: Café connect

properties.description: A friendly village pub at the heart of Corby Glen offering a warm, welcoming space for everyone. Whether you’re popping in for a cuppa, a chat or a pint, you’ll always find a friendly face and a comfortable spot by the fire. We’re dog-friendly, family-friendly, and community-focused, with teas, coffees, and soft drinks available, as well as home-cooked meals if you fancy something more. Our aim is to make sure no one feels alone and everyone feels welcome, whatever the weather.
properties.title: Fighting Cocks
